title: TypeStyler is finally updated
content: After many years TypeStyler has finally been updated for Mac OS X. A better version with more features of this classic tool form the 90s. Check it out at: [http://www.typestyler.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806051941/http:/www.typestyler.com/ "http://www.typestyler.com/")
author: bojev
